 @param agreementId this is the id of the agreement of which the winner is to be decleared

statements.documentation:
//! When you uncomment the below code then it just causes the crash without a proper reason, here we expect crash to return "NO_PENDING_CLAIMS" but instead it just throws error with
-Transaction: 0x5896b98d557a472e4f0063783b9e8bcf8ce7982de710c1c3c69c727e9989066a exited with an error (status 0) after consuming all gas.
-     Please check that the transaction:
-     - satisfies all conditions set by Solidity `assert` statements.
-     - has enough gas to execute the full transaction.
-     - does not trigger an invalid opcode by other means (ex: accessing an array out of bounds).

statements.documentation:
//! When you uncomment the below code then it just causes the crash without a proper reason, here we expect crash to return "NO_PENDING_CLAIMS" but instead it just throws error with
-Transaction: 0x5896b98d557a472e4f0063783b9e8bcf8ce7982de710c1c3c69c727e9989066a exited with an error (status 0) after consuming all gas.
-     Please check that the transaction:
-     - satisfies all conditions set by Solidity `assert` statements.
-     - has enough gas to execute the full transaction.
-     - does not trigger an invalid opcode by other means (ex: accessing an array out of bounds).

documentation.text:
@dev This function is for distributing the royalty payment
 @param agreementId this is the agreement Id of which royalty is to be claimed

AgreementCreated(address,string,uint256,.details: This event is emmited when a agreement is created.

params.agreementId: This is the id of the agreement that was created
params.ballotId: This is the ballot id of the agreement
params.contractHash: This is the hash of the contract file
params.contractLink: This is the link of the contract file
params.creationTime: This is the creation time of the contract
params.isPresent: This is to check if agreement is present or not
params.recordId: This is the record id to which the agreement belongs to
params.requester: This is the person who has requested for the agreement
params.title: This is the agreement title
params.tokenId: This is the id of token using which user can vote

AgreementVoting(address,uint256,uint256,.details: This is when a user votes for a publishing agreement

params.agreementId: This is the id of the publishing agreement that is linked to this ballot
params.ballotId: Id of the ballot where voting is stored
params.vote: State of vote : true for yes and false for No

BallotResult(uint256,uint256,bool,bool).details: this event is generated when result of a ballot is declared

params.agreementId: This is the id of the agreement that is linked to this ballot
params.ballotId: this is the ballot Id for which result is declared
params.minTurnOut: this status indicates if minimum amount of user showed up for voting  more than 66% of votes or false if user lost
params.result: this is the status of the result either true if user won that is he received

RoyaltyPayment(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.details: This evet is emitted when as royalty payment is done by a user for a royalty agreement.

params.agreementId: This is the id of the agreement that was created
params.recordId: This is the record id to which the agreement belongs to
params.royaltyAmountWei: This is the amount of royalty that has been paid by user in wei amount
params.royaltyId: This is the id of royalty that has been paid
params.royaltyPerTokenWei: This is how many wei each user will get for each token (token of "tokenId") he holds.
params.snapshotId: This is the snapshot id when the user distributed the reward
params.tokenId: This is the id of tokens that will used to determine the royalty ratio (it is holding tokenid)
params.totalSupplyEther: This is the total amount of tokens that are in circulation in ether value during the distribution was made

RoyaltyPaymentClaimed(uint256,uint256,ui.details: This event is emitted when a royalty payment is claimed

params.agreementId: This is the id of the agreement that was created
params.recordId: This is the record id to which the agreement belongs to
params.rewardAmount: This is the amount of reward that user claimed
params.royaltyId: This is the id of royalty that has been paid
params.userAddress: Address of user who claimed the royalty payment

_handleUserTokenTransfers(address,uint25.details: This function will be called when either user is transferring the tokens to other account, or is receiving tokens from other tokens.

params.newBalance: this is the new balance of the user that is after the transfer
params.previousBalance: this is the old balance of the user
params.user: address of the user whose balance is being changed

castVoteForAgreement(uint256,bool).details: This function is called by any user to cast vote

params.agreementId: this is the id of the agreement for which user is voting
params.vote: this is the state of the vote, if true than it means the vote is in favour of the ballot

claimRoyaltyAmount(uint256).details: This function is for distributing the royalty payment

params.agreementId: this is the agreement Id of which royalty is to be claimed

createAgreement(uint256,string,string,st.details: This function will create a new agreement voting ballot

params.contractHash: this is the hash of the agreement contract file
params.contractLink: this is the link of the agreement contract
params.platformFee: this is the incentive amount for the UI maintainer
params.platformWallet: this is the UI providers wallet
params.recordId: this is the id of record of which we need to create agreement of
params.title: This is the agreement title

declareWinner(uint256).details: This function can be called from external source and also from within the contract

params.agreementId: this is the id of the agreement of which the winner is to be decleared

initialize(address,address).details: This function sets the treasury Contract address and the governance address

params.newGovernanceContractAddress: This is the address for the governance contract
params.newTreasuryContractAddress: This is the new address of treasury contract

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: This is to set the address of the contracts

params.newCrdTokenContractAddress: This is the new address of crd token contract
params.newGovernanceContractAddress: This is the address for the governance contract
params.newTreasuryContractAddress: This is the address of new treasury contract
params.newTreasuryCoreContractAddress: This is the new address of treasury core contract

payRoyaltyAmount(uint256,uint256).details: This function is for distributing the royalty payment

params.agreementId: this is the id of the agreement of which the royalty is paid for
params.amount: this is the amount of royalty is being

setDepositAmount(uint256).details: This function sets the VOTING_DEPOSIT percentage

params.depositAmount: This is the new deposit amount needed for creating ballot

setMinTurnOut(uint256).details: This function sets the MIN_TURN_OUT percentage

params.minTurnOut: This is the new turnout percentage value

setOwnerAddress(address).details: This function sets the owner address

params.ownerAddress: This is the address of the owner

setVotingPeriod(uint256).details: This function sets the VOTING_BLOCK_PERIOD percentage
